attributes.action: Stop undermining the british people in favour of politically correctness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is not racist in any way just asking for fairness to majoritry of the population.
Stop this madness that is being pushed at us everyday.
The first time it started to get serious when the salvation army could not go into hospital to play christmas carols.
now the red arrows cant fly over the opening of the olympic games.
Last night of the proms is not safe from this madness,it not politically correct to wave the union jack at the last night of the proms,it might upset the minority,
And there are too many things to mention,the goverment must take full responcibilty for this.
The average person in the street are fed up of it.
We are British in these Islands.
so stop trying to change it, we the British people are haveing to bow down to your politically correct ideas.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
